src_original: kūrpārasya bhavennāhaḥ triguṇaḥ kamalodbhava //AP_44.028cd/  nāhaḥ prabāhumadhye tu ṣoḍaśāṅgula ucyate /AP_44.029ab/
vistareṇa karatalaṃ kīrtitaṃ tu ṣaḍaṅgulam /AP_44.030ab/  dairghyaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ madhyā pajcāṅgulā matā
tarjanyanāmikā caiva tasmādardhāṅgulaṃ vinā /AP_44.031ab/  kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhakau kāryau caturaṅgulasammitau  1 bhrūdairghyāccaturaṅgulā iti ṅa,
sarvāsāṃ parvaṇordhena nakhamānaṃ vidhīyate //AP_44.032cd/  vakṣaso yat pramāṇantu jaṭharaṃ tatpramāṇataḥ  aṅgulaikaṃ bhavennābhī vedhena ca pramāṇataḥ //AP_44.033cd/
nābhimadhye prīṇāho dvicatvāriṃśadaṅgulaiḥ //AP_44.034cd/  antaraṃ stanayoḥ kāryaṃ tālamātraṃ pramāṇataḥ
civukau(1) yavamānau tu maṇḍalaṃ dvipadaṃ bhavet //AP_44.035cd/  catuḥṣaṣṭyaṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ veṣṭanaṃ vakṣasaḥ  caturmukhañca tadadhoveṣṭanaṃ parikīrtitam //AP_44.036cd/
tasmādabhyadhikaṃ madhye tato nimnataraṃ kramāt /AP_44.038ab/  vistṛtāṣṭāṅgulaṃ jānutriguṇā pariṇāhataḥ  jaṅghāmadhye tu vistāraḥ saptāṅgula udāhṛtaḥ
